idea-plugin.name: Inspections test
idea-plugin.description:
Allows you to test inspections.
Usage: install plugin and launch your intellij idea from cmd with following arguments:
idea.sh test-inspect < path_to_your_project > < path_to_inspection_profile.xml > -v< verbose_level(1,2,3) > -d < path_to_source_directory > Optional: -t ... -- test classes root directories (only these test classes will be run); if not specified, root directory will be searched in project settings -m ... -- main classes root (needed for test classes); if not specified, root directory will be searched in project settings
